heading.description: Professional civil and environmental engineering firm specialized in structural design, sustainability and safety. Our qualified team provides innovative technical solutions for high-value projects.

services.comprehensiveSet: A comprehensive set of technical services

structuralDesign.title: Structural Design
structuralDesign.content: Building structural design, structural calculations and static verifications for residential and commercial buildings

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.content: Coordination and supervision of construction works, technical management and quality control during all construction phases

buildingPermits.title: Building Permits
buildingPermits.content: Complete management of building permits, construction permits and regulatory compliance for construction projects

energyEfficiency.title: Energy Efficiency
energyEfficiency.content: Energy diagnostics Law 10, APE certifications and photovoltaic system design for sustainability

technicalConsulting.title: Technical Consulting
technicalConsulting.content: Tender procedures, public contracts, technical verifications and specialized consulting for civil engineering projects
